synopsis.text: Nome's performance, Alto Saotome, a young mecha pilot trainee, finds himself in an unexpected battle against mysterious biomechanical aliens known as the Vajra. As chaos ensues, Alto saves a young girl named Ranka Lee from the alien threat. Impressed by his skills, the Strategic Military Services program recruits Alto to combat the new extraterrestrial menace. As the story unfolds, secrets from the past are unveiled, and new Valkyries are revealed, taking the Macross universe to new heights. With a blend of music and intense dogfights, Macross Frontier promises an exciting journey through the galaxy.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
